title: NASA Daymet V4 Daily Surface Weather Data (1980–Present)
license: Open Data (NASA EOSDIS, Earthdata Login required)
description: Gridded daily weather parameters (1 km) for North America from NASA Daymet V4. Variables include tmax, tmin, precipitation, shortwave radiation, snow water equivalent, vapor pressure.
attribution: NASA ORNL DAAC — Daymet V4 Daily Surface Weather Data
